Description

Responsible for initializing button actions in the application.

Manages the connection to the application's database.
EditReminderController
 
EncryptionUtility
 
FDAApiService
This class is responsible for directly querying the openFDA API to fetch drug label information.
MainApplication
Main entry point for the application.
MainController
Main controller for managing application views and user interactions.
Medication
The Medication class represents a medication with various properties such as FDA ID, brand name, generic name, manufacturer, active ingredients, and pharmacologic classes.
MedicationDAO
This class provides methods for interacting with the medication-related tables in the database.
MedicationInfoPage
 
MedicationOverviewController
 
MedicationParser
The MedicationParser class provides methods to parse medication data returned by API queries.
MedicationReminder
 
MedicationSearchController
The MedicationSearchController class is responsible for linking the UI view with the logic for handling the search functionality contained in the MedicationDAO.
moodRating
Represents mood ratings for users, allowing the creation, retrieval, and management of mood data.
OpenFDAClient
The OpenFDAClient class provides functionality to search for medications using the openFDA API and parse the results.
PDFReportGenerator
 
RemindersController
Controller for managing reminders, such as viewing, editing, and deleting them.
Session
Singleton class to manage the current user session in the application.
SettingsController
 
UserAccount
Represents a user account in the application.
UserAccountDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) for interacting with UserAccount entities in the database.

WorkoutReturnModel
 
WrappingText
A custom text class that supports wrapping.
